overview: Tommy's father can't put up with him any more and sends his cheeky son to Bootcamp. But instead of a farmyard, Tommy finds a chamber where he and his two fellow victims are held up for a good seeing to! Tied up and gagged, they have to endure tickle torment, beatings and trampling as well as being spat and pissed on. They are made to sniff smelly socks, eat from a dog dish, and lick mashed food from other men's bare feet. Anything goes for the guards - they even make the boys suck them off and give them a hard shagging. When they try to rebel, they are punished with a whipping and have hot wax dripped on their backs. Basti and Tommy are made to shag each other with a double-ended dildo and then piss on themselves - an education that is guaranteed to succeed!  Featuring Spanking, Sneaks/Socks/Feet, Tickling, TT, CBT, Bondage, Feeding, Play-Rape, Trampling, Spitting, Wax, Double Dildo, Whipping, Dogplay, Self-pissing and Beating! It's the new Sk8erboy!
title: Bootcamp
